name: Soul Breakout
description:
Possess the bodies of lost knights and breakout the trapped souls of a medieval village while avoiding getting possessed and being part of the lost knights. 

Movement: WASD

Sprint: Shift

Possess: E

Do tasks: T

Goal - Acquire the associated body to do the 2 tasks. There are 5 character bodies  in the game, so the player has to finish 10 tasks in total.
